title: Hooked by the Merman
description: Taking a much needed vacation, Adeline goes on a cruise. Hoping to satisfy a mysterious longing that's plagued her since childhood, she explores her sexuality on the deck of the ship during a storm. Yet hidden in the dark, tossing waves, is a being more beautiful, and sexual, than anything she could have ever dreamed, and he has his heart set on taking her to his world.... *WARNING* THIS SHORT STORY HAS HARDCORE SCENES OF GRAPHIC FANTASY SEX. FOR ADULTS ONLY. Other books by Tallia Ravejoy: RIDDEN BY THE GRIFFIN PRINCE HUNTED BY THE STAG KING
author: Tallia Ravejoy
